thread.title: UK's Centrica extends North Morecambe gas field outage
thread.title_full: UK's Centrica extends North Morecambe gas field outage

title: UK's Centrica extends North Morecambe gas field outage
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sat, Jul 4, 2015, 05:05 BST - UK Markets closed UK's Centrica extends North Morecambe gas field outage Reuters - UK Focus – 11 hours ago -1.30 
(Extends unplanned outage) 
July 3 (Reuters) - Britain's Centrica (LSE: CNA.L - news ) on Friday extended the duration of an unplanned outage at its North Morecambe gas field, with output now due to resume at 0500 GMT on July 4, it said in an updated market message. 
Previously output had been expected to resume at 1700 GMT on Friday. 
The outage, which began at 0322 GMT, stopped gas deliveries from the field. 
(Reporting by Oleg Vukmanovic and Sarah McFarlane; Editing by Clarence Fernandez and David Goodman) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
